text: Władysław I Herman (ca. 1044 - 4 June 1102), was a Duke of Poland from 1079 until his death. He was the second son of Casimir I the Restorer by his wife Maria Dobroniega, daughter of Vladimir the Great, Grand Duke of Kiev. Category:1040s births Category:1102 deaths Category:Polish dukes
title: Władysław I Herman
